ProjectTitle: In search of a true vita canonica. Normative texts and their manuscripts as alternative witnesses for the emergence of the canonical reform movement (9th-11th century)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/06/2022
Very good DMP. You do however not mention the use of any tools for document management or annotation such as Zotero (https://www.zotero.org) or Tropy (https://tropy.org) that may make data management easier. You can always contact the RDM helpdesk if you have questions about which tools are available and how to use them (rdm@kuleuven.be)
label: good with suggestions
